content: Luca Biggio | Department of Computing Sciences Skip to main content Open shareCloseShareClose Luca Biggio I am an Assistant Professor in the Department of Computing Sciences at Bocconi University. My research focuses on understanding the inner workings of neural networks, identifying their limitations, and enhancing their efficiency. I am also interested in interdisciplinary applications of deep learning across various fields of science and engineering. I hold a PhD from ETH Zurich and completed my postdoctoral research at EPFL.
